text:
これで直るのではという雰囲気が

attachments.fallback: GitHub: Fix font regression on macOS by thornjad · Pull Request #3811 · alacritty/alacritty
attachments.title: Fix font regression on macOS by thornjad · Pull Request #3811 · alacritty/alacritty
attachments.text: The 0.0 alpha background works great for emoji, but normal text does not render well on macOS. Instead, use 1.0 for non-pre-colored glyphs. Fixes #3809
